column4: I have a computer with about 300MB RAM, any tips for speeding up Ubuntu? Should I look into a different window manager?
any difference between lubuntu and Ubuntu other than window manager?
do you think if I grabbed Ubuntu Server and threw a window manager on top of it, it would run much lighter?
I use LXDE (lubuntu) any time I need light weight. You can still use all your regular Ubuntu packages and programs under it, and to a large degree I can
Use the lubuntu disk and do a clean install if you want a lighter-weight system
